line.text: 'Cannot send your personal ship to inspection.'

line.comment: *$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $balance.f, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 130
* 3.15: Removes recycling options from this menu and implements the detailed inspection feature instead.

line.text: 'A ship with the same template, if any, will be rebuilt after recycling.'
'For fleet ships, it is recommended to use the reinforcement feature, available from the Fleet settings menu.'
'For Workers see their Outpost Manager section.'

line.comment: * $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Failures', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $failures, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4

line.text: 'Docking prevents that ships become more expensive over time.'
'Click on ships to perform an inspection at homebase or the nearest safe Outpost.'
'Inspection resets maintenance factor to 100% at no cost other than time.'
'Ships you manually send for inspection will not resume previous commands.'
'Workers automatically repair and inspect when needed. Fleets have a dedicated setting.'
'Your Tax efficiency is extremely limited until you aquire nation status.'

sval.val: Cannot send your personal ship to inspection.
Being undocked slowly increases ship upkeep.
A ship with the same template, if any, will be rebuilt after recycling.
For fleet ships, it is recommended to use the reinforcement feature, available from the Fleet settings menu.
For Workers see their Outpost Manager section.
Docking prevents that ships become more expensive over time.
Docking on carriers makes upkeep free.
Click on ships to perform an inspection at homebase or the nearest safe Outpost.
Inspection resets maintenance factor to 100% at no cost other than time.
Ships you manually send for inspection will not resume previous commands.
Workers automatically repair and inspect when needed. Fleets have a dedicated setting.
Your Tax efficiency is extremely limited until you aquire nation status.
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $balance.f, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 130
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
3.15: Removes recycling options from this menu and implements the detailed inspection feature instead.
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Failures', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $failures, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
